title: Strategies for Improving Job Performance through Learning Style Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational job-related knowledge; no experience in learning style diagnostics
context.additional_context: An operational environment combining a smartphone-based mobile learning platform with weekly face-to-face workshops. Requires activity-centered design linked to practical cases in social fields.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze individual cognitive/sensory/social learning tendencies using learning style diagnostic tools
Based on diagnostic results, learners can develop personalized learning strategies to optimize job training materials
In blended learning environments, learners improve learning efficiency by 30% or more through integrated use of mobile devices and face-to-face activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
